opponent.label: Aqua
opponent.artist: MyMainAccIsANord (Model, Posing), Nomelet (Image Attachments), Zeuses Swan Song (Hair)
opponent.description: One of the three Keyblade wielders who trained under master Eraqus at the Land of Departure, and the only one of the three to become a true Keyblade Master. Though she is an elegant, brave fighter and devoted friend, Aqua lacks intimate social experience.
